Text: Since the Age Credit is income-tested, it will benefit low to middle income seniors. With this measure, an individual aged 65 could receive up to $150 more per year and a couple could receive up to $300 more per year.
Cause: Since the Age Credit is income-tested, it will benefit low to middle income seniors.
Effect: With this measure, an individual aged 65 could receive up to $150 more per year and a couple could receive up to $300 more per year.
Sentence: <e1>Since the Age Credit is income-tested, it will benefit low to middle income seniors.</e1> <e2>With this measure, an individual aged 65 could receive up to $150 more per year and a couple could receive up to $300 more per year.</e2>
